title: Add Sides type
description:
Add the famous `(left: ..., right: ..., top: ..., bottom: ...)` as a built-in type in elembic, say `e.types.sides(T)`.

It should:
- Cast from dictionary or T.
- Dictionary cast is checked: must contain left/right/top/bottom, or x/y/rest, all of type T.
- Casting from T means all sides have the same value.
